transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Namaste Good evening sir. Good evening sir.
Customer: Good evening bol rahe hai sir aap
Executive: Kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Thik thak hu abhi chal raha hai bol rahe hai ki IndiaMART itna slow kyu ho gaya?
Executive: Kya issue aa raha hai sir aapko bataiye.
Customer: Issue kuch dino se kuch match nahi ho raha hai naya wala Jalandhar ka lead bhi nahi aa raha hai lead wala lead bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Buyleads nahi mil rahi hai aapko relevant?
Customer: Nahi buyleads nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Okay to abhi aap apna seller open kar sakte hai?
Customer: Abhi open kar dunga 5 minute mein open kar dunga.
Executive: Kariye aap main ek video meet ka link send karunga video meet connect kar lijiyega aap.
Customer: Okay main dekhta hu kya kya issue aap face kar rahe hai just kitne minute mein call karu aapko?
Executive: Main aapko 5:13 baj rahe hai aapko 5:30 baje tak call kar raha hu main.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai 5:30 baje call kijiye sari cheeze hum baith ke dekhte hai bilkul solve karte hai jo bhi issue aap face kar rahe hai bilkul sir main aapko help karunga okay sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai sir aap call kijiyega main abhi just call kar dunga aapko okay thank you sir.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- IndiaMART is slow, not getting relevant buyleads.

- New Jalandhar leads are not coming.



Resolution:

- Executive will send a video meet link.

- Executive assured to resolve the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back at 5:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, slow, video meet, seller account
